ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Symphonic Harmony?
ygData.msgSnippet: No clue - doh. Might be interesting if a weapon proc required some other item but then you d think that they would have the same message when you cast a spell
ygData.messageBody:
No clue - doh.

Might be interesting if a weapon proc required some other item but then
you'd think that they would have the same message when you cast a spell that
requires a reagent you dont have.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Greg Gillan" <ggillan@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, May 01, 2000 9:30 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Symphonic Harmony?


> I picked up a Symponic Sabre last week (11/23, 10cha, 5int, effect:
> symphonic harmony)
> Every time the effect procs, I get a message that says "Item is out of
> charges".
>
> Anyone else seen this? Or have any idea what symphonic harmony does yet?
> I'm assuming its busted, it never had charges, nor have I ever seen a
> charge-based proc.
>
>
> Elwyn Heartstring
> 52 Minstrel, Erollisi Marr
>
